content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I live in an area not far from a nuclear power plant, in fact i can see the plant when the trees have few leaves on them from my living room. i live on a hill in a small neighborhood that is secluded and over looking a town. i like to walk at night anywhere from 10pm to 2am, i started walking at night about 4 or so years ago, since then i have seen multiple sighting of what i believe to be ufos. i can have all of my stories collaborated by my younger sister who walks with me at night (i don't like to walk alone because i live in a very wooded area and am afraid of coyotes which are close in the area). since i started walking i have seen many different types of things in the sky, i first started noticing them when i would look up at the stars in the sky (i love astronomy) i would see what looked like stars but they weren't and they weren't planes either because i see a lot of planes, i can spot planes. 

                        these blips (i call them) were very high up in the sky (mostly) and only appear when planes aren't fling in the sky, they fly faster than planes and change direction abruptly i see as many as 2-7 a week, i never just see one at night usually there is one and a few minutes later a different one. they usually always fly in the direction closer to the power plant even if it is very high in the sky, i will never see them in the direction of the town, but it may be because of the light pollution (i can see the town lights from my hill). 

                 the blips aren't the only kinds 'things' see in the sky, i have been witness to a few other kinds too. more recently in the end of july i noticed a very strange orb flying very wobbly in the distance in the tree line facing the nuclear power plant it was very bright (blue-ish. white-ish, maybe yellow-ish) saw it on two occasions both in the same few days, my sister was also witness to this. about a week later my neighbor (who is a year and a half older then me) came over to my house and i asked her if she had seen anything strange recently. she described to me exactly what i had seen only she was parked next to the river a few miles downriver from the power plant (which is in the river) she also said it seemed to be up high around the tree line of our hill. 
     
                there is more, i have also seen two slower lower large orange 'orbs' go across the sky a few months to a year ago very close to my house, it was very frightening. and even before that about 2 years ago was one of my first sightings, it was sunset and my two little sisters and i went for a walk around our neighborhood (it's a circle shape) and when we're were on the other side of the neighborhood and we turned to look at the sunset (which was within half an hour or so. when we turned around we saw what looked live a flame slowly going over our neighborhood, it moved slowly and didn't move in a straight line and it lasted almost a minute then dissapeared.
 there will definetly be more sightings.
content.summary: Many events, boy do i have somethings to tell you.

content.detailedDescription: On the night of august 14th in i believe 1990, my best friend and i were hanging out outside our apartment building when one of us noticed a very slow moving or possibly stationery black object in the s.W. sky, which at the time was the direction of the indianapolis, in airport.  we watched the object trying to figure out what it could be.  we would see the object for a minute or so and it would slowly move out of our line of site due to trees blocking our view.  after a short time, we would see the object again above the tree line and it again would hoover and move slowly.  we watched the object over approximately an hours time.  when we first noticed the craft, it was moving very, very slowly east from what appeared just above the area of west washington street and the i-465 ramp.  we seen the object move east then lost site of it due to trees, so the object was probably about 100-150 off the ground.  after we lost site of the object the first time, we seen the object several minutes later, this time at a closer distance and now travelling west this time.  it seemed to continue this path east and west a few more times before the sightings stopped around 1:00am on august 15th.  i recall talking about the craft having red and blue lights but do not recall if they were solid or flashing or if there were any other colors.  i am certain about the date being august 14th because my birthday was the next day, however, the year could have been 1991 instead of 1990.  i remember talking to my dad when he arrived home around 1:00 - 1:30am on the 15th and described the object.  he dismissed it as a ufo due to it having lights, he stated if it was a ufo, they would not draw attention to themselves by having colored lights.  he also stated that ufo's would not be so close to a major airport (a mile or less away).  my fiend observed everything i saw and jokingly ran out to the street, jumped up and down, waived his arms yelling "me...Me..Me" but we never spoke about the event after that night.  being 12 years old, we did not feel afraid for some reason.  some years later, i seen the militaries new stealth jet and recall it looked similar to what we had seen, however, the object we seen was completely silent(at least from our distance), living that close to a busy airport, we would see and hear commercial jets countless times a day and from that distance the sound of a jet would be extremely loud and we would have felt the vibration as well.  also, the craft was much lower that a jet or plane would be and was moving very slowly (maybe 10mph) and appeared to hoover in mid air on a few occasions.
content.summary: Dull black triangle. silent. red and blue lights on object.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my way back from a late night/early morning stroll,when i heard a commercial airliner throttle up,as it gained height above me,on the street where i live. i live not far from doncaster robin hood international airport,so i'm quite used to the air traffic,but i always have a look,just to see if i can make out what make of aircraft it is,just for my own interest.
i looked up,mainly because the aircraft sounded quite low,& saw what at first i took to be the iss,which i'm also familiar with,but it then began changing direction to fly almost alongside the aircraft,but to the rear of it. at this point the aircraft seemed like it was deliberately trying to outpace the object. this was when i knew it wasn't the iss or a star,simply because stars don't move about in the night sky,to my knowledge,& the iss doesn't change direction,as it moves across the sky,as far as i know.
what happened next is still stunning to me,even though i've seen another ufo do the same thing at around 2:30am,on 27th may!!
the ufo flashed very intensely 4 or 5 times intermittently,in the aircraft's general direction,then it simply veered into some light cloud,at a leisurely pace,& disappeared,as the aircraft continued on into the distant night/early morning sky!! i waited for a good few minutes for it to emerge at the other side of the cloud,but it never did. the time was now around 3:13am.

as i sat in my living room afterwards,contemplating what i'd just witnessed,it dawned on me that this particular ufo was so close to that aircraft,that at least one of the flight crew must have noticed it at some point. even some of the passengers must have seen the intensely bright flashes it made.
it was this,& other sightings i've had in my life,that made me want to report it for once. i tried to report a sighting i had years ago,but nothing came of it. surely someone on board that aircraft saw something that corroborates my sighting,because i know what i saw & it wasn't a hallucination,it really happened,above the street where i live!!
content.summary: Starlike ufo flashing at airplane throttling up above me,then moving away into light cloud & disappearing

content.detailedDescription: 530 am went out side to go to work. as usual i went to the side walk and looked around to make sure every things ok with the house. i remember i lit a cigarette and looked up at the front porch and that's when i saw glowing red ball. about the size of a softball. i walked slowly  towards it.I started up the fire escape at the side of the house. as i slowly went up i could see it plane as day. it was about the size of a basket ball but see through. the soft ball size ball was glowing bright red. i was maybe eight or nine feet away from it. as i was looking at it the red ball stopped glowing and the thing was gone at a tremendous rate of speed.That was the last time that i saw it.
content.summary: 530 am went out side to go to work

content.detailedDescription:
Not much more i can say besides my short description. nothing could go that fast on this earth and be that silent. it went about as fast as fighter jet. it got bigger as it got closer. and it was pretty far away....Within seconds it got much closer. nothing we have flies that way, that low or fast. or could turn that way or be that silent. it was a diamond shaped ball... the color/light kept rapidly shimmering from light orange to deep orange. it was so frightening. i ran in to tell my boyfriend. he and i saw something years ago together while living a few miles away. but it was very different. it was a very large irregular formation of dozens of  small twinkling star like lights that all moved together in unison. it covered 1/4 of the night sky.
it was silent and the formation blocked out all other stars behind it, although the center of the formation looked as black as the sky/the same color as the sky. it was as if the perimeter of 'stars' were the very outside edges of an invisible craft. 
so when i came in he believed me immediately. he felt my shaking and extremely fast pounding heart beat. when he and i saw the formation together years ago, we were not frightened. this time felt different. like it (the orange craft) knew i saw it and began coming in my direction fast when it noticed me watching it. it felt directed at me somehow. i am very sensitive and empathic and it had a definite energy and purpose about it. i know that sounds crazy. but that is how it felt to me.
content.summary: Bright orange light much bigger than a star or low aircraft. low in sky going fast south then turned abruptly to come east over head. before it got too near overhead i ran into the house scared. very very scared.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were enjoying our rented hot tub around 11:30pm to midnight. we had observed several meteors and airliners. the sky was very clear and there was little ambient light in the area.

i noticed these two star-like lights flashing erraticly but moving at a very steady spead and heading from the sw to the ne.  the distance between the lights did not change a bit leading us to conclude they belonged to a single vehicle. we tried to see if stars were blocked out by it's passage but it's flight path didn't take it in front of any bright stars and it was very difficult to tell. altitude was very difficult to tell, but i would estimate that it would be roughly half the altitude of an airliner, which we see regularly in the sky from our backyard. so roughly 15000 to 18000 feet.

the entire sighting lasted about 2 or 3 minutes. these were not any kind of aircraft lights that i have ever seen.
content.summary: Observed these 2 slights flashing erraticly, one behind the other separated by a short distance (50 or 100 yards)

content.detailedDescription:
While watching tv i noticed a bright orange light
through my livingoom window moving towards me then it began to turn to the left.As i grabbed my mobile phone and manage to open the camera this took an few minutes i ran through the back door to take footage.It was an very mild night and not a sound from the ufo
content.summary: The ufo was circle shape very bright orange light came from the north then turned left west no sound silent

content.detailedDescription: A man posted photos on social media,while he was driving in florida late friday afternoon on august 15, 2015. in the first photo it appears at first glance to be a lighting strike but after closer inspection it looks like a perfect cylinder coming down from the sky and hitting the ground. i wouldn't say it was a ufo for sure but it is definitely an extraordinary phenomenon. the second photo was two seconds later and it shows that the light is gone for a perspective of how fast it hit.
content.summary: I wouldnt call it a ufo but a wierd straight cylindar lighting strike to exact to be regular strike.

content.detailedDescription: I was out on a boat cruise in vancouver bay.Was taking some pics and a bright flash happened. i didnt see it with the naked eye,but my phone had caught something moving very fast through the frame. when i look close it looks like a oval shape moving through the frame.
content.summary: Bright oval over the vancouver inlet,it lasted seconds.I was taking photos from the boat and  a sudden flash happened.I didnt know i had taken a photo of anything till i looked at my phone about 30 min later.

content.detailedDescription: Late at night (aprox. 1 am) and recording the night sky with a night scope. (that is why the video is green) and recorded aprox. 4 or more objects most happen at the first min. of the video. what do you think they are?
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Recorded the sky with a night scope and captured on tape the objects

content.detailedDescription: I lived in a log cabin 5 miles off the grid in the nazko valley west of quesnel b.C..While there for 13 yrs i had a no. of encounters not enough room here to tell all. would like to discuss these events with someone who listens. i also think i was abducted at one point lost a whole day and awoke to what looks like stitches scar on my hand. had what looked like a stealth fly over me very slowly and made no noise but i know a stealth would never fly that low or that quiet or travel that slowly.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: i have a number of events to relate too

content.detailedDescription: We where on the deck. and seen heat lighting and went to the border of the property and then seen it. we where looking at the lighting then it moved. a ufo right away. it was quick it hovered looked round and lots of lights it had like a weird shape on top. red lights that flashed white lights and it moved very fast. landed twice  then it went into the tree line. very nerves and shakey and in tis beleaf. and very cautious of my surroundings.Scared to sleep alone and stunned. it went into the tree lines and like turned invisable.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Scary and big

content.detailedDescription: I was upstairs in my home in my bedroom. i looked out the window noticing how clear and cloudless the evening was. then i saw three white what i thought were clouds. two small and one large. there were no other clouds in the sky. i thought maybe it was three airplanes. but there was no vapour trail and they were all moving at the exact same speed which wasn't very fast.It looked like three white ovals, the colour of clouds. two small and one large. the larger one was in the middle and the one small was in front of the larger oval and the other small one was behind. at times, i thought i could see a silver dome shape on top of the larger one as if the sun was reflecting off of it. it was a perfectly clear day and as i said not a cloud in the sky. i continued to watch as they slowly moved in a nw direction across the sky. they were above the water, either the annapolis basin or further out in the bay of fundy. it was difficult to guess the size of these objects or even if they were three separate objects or one large one with three different light points. by this time i had decided that this was not an airplane as i see these all the time flying over, usually planes from the nearby air force base, greenwood. i watched for as long as i was able to see them, approx. 10 minutes. after this i sent outside to see if i could see them moving nw. i saw nothing. again no vapour trails or anything. no clouds. decided that i had indeed seen a ufo. cool! not sure if anyone else had seen this as well. i did tell a few people though.
content.summary: Three bright white oval shaped objects in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
We were sitting in our living room and noticed a bright light coming toward the house, slowly, closer and closer...We went out on our porch, on the west side of the house and noticed a triangle shape above the house, it was humming, had lumps and bumps on the lower side and white lights, it seems to be still, we ran through the house to the deck on the east side of the house and it was still there, humming, it seemed to barely move as it slowly headed east over our field (20 acres) then as it went over a small hill in the distance it took off in record breaking speed and it was gone, no trail, nothing, just gone! my husband and i looked at each other and asked it we had both seen the same thing, yes! we tried at frist to contact local air fields and air ports, had no luck..We just didnt know who to call and assumed people would think we were nuts and just imagined it. we still can see it in our minds and when we watch your show, we see different crafts that look like the one we saw. we felt excited at first, then talked about it for years, we still remember it like it was yesterday.
the craft just disappeared.
content.summary: Saw a bright light coming closer and closer, the triangle shape hovered over our field then disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
We were at our cottage overlooking a lake. several of us were gathered around a camp fire. i was waiting for the moon to break over the clouds when along came this large solid orange ball of of light.  i looked at it for a few seconds and observed it moving slowly what looked to be 3,000 feet in elevation but hard to tell. i called my wife, son and a couple of others to come see. we watched it for another good minute or more still moving from south east to north west over the tree line. my wife thought it looked like a vertical football. no one had ever seen anything like this before. suddenly it stopped for 5 seconds then it made a 90 degree turn and shot away at super high speed to the east 'till out of sight,about 2 seconds. we all looked at each other in amazement and said "we just saw a ufo". 

the next day one of the observers showed me a picture of a saucer shaped object that was sighted the same night in northern ontario canada about 300 kms north of us. just seemed odd.
content.summary: 1/8 size of moon, slow moving

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were traveling home from lower mi. it was around 10:45 est. just outside of bergland, mi traveling west towards wakefield, my girlfriend said "what the hell is that in the sky?". i pulled the van over to side of road and got out. what i saw was a triangular, glowing object in the sky travelling south across the sky. it was far brighter than any stars and much larger than any stars. i watched it till it disappeared into the treeline on other side of road. it made no noise, and there were no colored, blinking lights like you see on an airplane. the object appeared to be much larger than any airplane would be at that same altitude. it was very bright and glowing. and the outline of a rigid triangle was clearly visible. it was a clear night. not a cloud in the sky at time of observation. it was by far the brightest object in the sky. it was also traveling fast. faster than any airplanes i have ever observed. i have been mentally affected by what i saw, i do not believe it was a plane or a sattlelight. it was the second anomally i have seen in 3 weeks. i also have a picture i can't explain from a sighting at lake superior just 2 weeks before this event. but this object from this event i'm reporting was coming from the direction of lake superior.
content.summary: Seen triangular shaped glowing object flying through sky from north to south.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my way home that night from a long night of catching chickens. when as i usually do on the van ride home i meditated. lately i've been trying to find answers. so i've been broadcasting myself out into the universe welcoming a ufo encounter. 
well that night once i got home i was having a smoke in my back yard at 3:50 am give or take a couple minutes. i was looking up into the sky and seen a bright light. must have been about 300 meters straight above me. i stood there watching for about 2 minutes when i could feel as if the occupants of the bright white light like orb craft were talking to me inside my head. telling me not to be scared even though my intuition was telling me it was something bad. they told me that soon they're going to show everyone. and that i got a weird feeling i was chosen for something. but i stood there watching it, and it shot upwards about a mile instantly. hovered there for a bit, then went further into the distance in front of my view at the same altitude, did another zig zag into the distance off to the east. 
side note though. 
i had a weird feeling like the orb was actually right in front of my face because it moved super fast it looked slow its hard to explain. it had a light trail behind it when it took off.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I was broadcasting myself through meditation welcoming a ufo encounter

content.detailedDescription: My wife an i witnessed four seperate ords over 30 seconds travelling in the same direction one afer the other. ther was no sound and the flight pattern was strange due to massive jerking moves. we live near a flight path from gatwick so are used to planes and there noise these were totally silent and travelling faster then anything i have ever seen. i have been to airshows and have seen military planes which all make noise and are unable to fly at these speeds over land. the ords all to the same flight path and made erratic moves ..But all four made the same moves and the disappeared into the clouds.. they appeared bright but almost see through . my wife describes them as dancing across the sky. i am sure that we are not the only people who witnessed this event ..
content.summary: My wife an i witnessed four seperate ords over 30 seconds travelling in the same direction one afer the other. ther was no sound and the flight pattern was strange due to massive jerking moves.

content.detailedDescription: It was early sunday morning  2am in my back yard had a fire was just looking at the stars & seen these really vivid lights .At first i thought it was a plane but after 5 minutes it nevered moved that's when i got my binoculars & started watching it for over an hour.It looked like a sphere with really bright red, green,blue,yellow lights and it just hovered there.Not sure what it is but it wasn't normal.When the house came back out & it was gone.
content.summary: Watch with  binoculars for over an hour just hovering in the same spot with very brilliant lights

content.detailedDescription: While sitting on our front porch tonight we both witnessed a star like twinkling amber color object ascended from treetops in a straight line up into the night sky into space and disappear.  it moved very fast and shot straight up seemed to be one or two miles away in the rocky river/lakewood oh area. photo and cell phone does not capture the details and color.
content.summary: Star like twinkling amber color object ascended from treetops in a straight line up int the night sky into space and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I had just left my work site and was driving south on hwy 4 as i seen 5 glwing orange red objects approaching me...I quicky stopped and took several pictures as they approached heading north.There was no noise from the objects and two were in the leed and 3 followed seperated by maybe 500 yrds.I knew instantly they were not human aircraft for there was no noise and being as close as they were if they were planes they would have made noise also there was no strobe lights just pulsating orange red glow.They continued north untill out of sight.I have the pictures on my phone and have not downloaded to my comp but i can send them by text.
content.summary: 5 orange light approached my location and continued north

content.detailedDescription: was going to garage and noticed an object that appeared to be a flaming ball(fireball)moving slowly across the sky.  ran to get the camcorder (10+ yrs old) and was able to get the 2nd one. did not expect a 2nd one.  they did disappear over the lake and i am very close to the lake but surrounded by trees.  so, flaming ball, moving slowly, no elevation change, disappeared.  did not look like a chinese lantern, my 1st thought when 1st seen.  too flamey.  unless they can actually catch fire without loosing any elevation while moving and keep a round sun like shape?  i saw a flaming ball and the camera saw a bright orb.  best i can tell ya. pretty cool.
content.summary: Observed 2  moving ball's of flame that disappeared over lake michigan near the shore line.

content.detailedDescription: i was sitting on my deck at around ten thirty in the evening. it is a very rural , quite area. i was facing north, with an unobstructed view of a mountain range. we live on a hill and also have a very large clear view of the night sky,especialy to the east and north. we often sit out in the warm nights and have done so for many years. we are very familiar with shooting stars , meteorites, and planes that fly over every night. so iam one hundred percent positive that what i seen last week was not ashooting star, meteor, or some type of airplane.    i am not totally comfortable using computer , but i will do my best , i seen what i at first thought was just another falling star, it looked to be coming from very high up from the northeast. this part is hard to describe ,but this is what happened, what i was watching suddenly went dark, then it went bright again, then dark, then bright, it kept going from bright to dark during the whole time i seen it. and it was not just a flash when it was bright, i would say it would stay bright for close to half a kilometer each time, and it would stay dark the exact same amount of time , and distance, that it stayed bright.  now for the flight path, as i said it was coming down from the northeast on about  a 45 degree angle. i fully expected it to disappear behind the mountain range as it continued it 45 degree drop. but to my amazement, it changed direction, it completely leveled off, and was in front of the mountains, and flew completely straight and level, in front of the mountains, until trees blocked my view.  the whole time i seen it the lights were going from dark to bright, like i described above.   it was moving almost twice as fast as a passenger plane, and obviously was on a controlled path. what it was ,i have no idea.  the light at first, i thought maybe it was some kind of light been turned on and off at the front of the object, when the light would come on, it looked like a beam of light, and every time the light came on, the beam of light was the same length, this why i cant understand it been a beam of light ,if it was a beam of light , the beam would keep going, not alternately go dark, so therefore i think the object was lighting up, remember i do not want my name released, if you can tell me what it was or have questions please call,.   thanks,pat
content.summary: Seen very strange object flying in the sky, in front of a mountain range, i had an unobstucted view

content.detailedDescription: Me and my family are staying at disney world's wilderness lodge. staring at the sky, i noticed a red blip that was flickering slightly. i kept watching it thinking it was the planet mars or maybe venus with weird atmospheric effects. as i watched, it moved down. i wondered if it was a plane, but it stopped short and then did a sort of loop. there was a tree as a frame of reference so i know for sure it was moving. i was super skeptical and watched for some time. i considered the possibility that it might be a drone. then, i looked away for a minute or less and it was just gone.
content.summary: Looked like a star but kept changing directions in impossible ways. i thought it was a planet at first because of the way it was flickering with no obvious pattern

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to smoke a cigarette,i looked up and saw a star shaped object overhead flying from the sw to ne. there was absolutely no noise. i watched it until it faded from sight.I looked up because of the meteor shower,no meteors. i thought it would burn out,it didn't. i was a member of the usaf and it didn't look like any ac i've seen.
content.summary: Looked up saw a star shaped object flying fairly fast no noise. watched it until it faded from sight

content.detailedDescription:
We saw a ufo a couple nights ago. my husband and iwere sitting out on our deck watching the last night of the meteor shower when we both saw something weird. it caught scott's (husbands) eye first. he told me to look where he was pointing. it was a slow moving pinpoint of light and we both figured it must be a satellite. too high up and no blinking lights to be a plane. then here is where it gets weird...It came to a stop and appeared to come closer to us or grow exponentially in size, or both. it got bigger than any other celestial body i have ever seen in the night sky (besides the moon), and so bright! scott said, "what the f--- is that???" we were both freaking out a little bit. then it suddenly shrank back to its original size and/or place and continued its original trajectory ... until we could no longer see it any longer. 

the thing that was so strange was the size and brightness and the fact that it stopped moving for a moment and grew to the size it grew, or flew closer, or both ... whichever the case may be. it was like someone was shining a flashlight on us for a few seconds. then went back to being a teeny weeny little pinpoint of light in an instant. 

yeah, i suppose it could be the military trying out some new something, sure. that's completely in the realm of possible. but it was unidentifiable to us, therefore it was a ufo.
content.summary: Saw pinpoint of light headed from south to north then hovered, got big n bright then receded and resumed path until gone from sight

content.detailedDescription: Same as above
content.summary: Tree star like lights  seperated lights aascenting  up and fading out of site

content.detailedDescription: On tuesday august 11, 2015 i was vacationing in parksville, canada, which is located on the east coast of vancouver island in canada. at approximately 9:30pm i witnessed a bright orb-shaped light suddenly appear in the night sky across the water from the beach boardwalk in parksville. the bright light appeared and disappeared about 4 times. it looked like it ascended from the water and then descended back into the water. during this time a smaller red light appeared to move away and around the bright white light. this continued for about an hour. i photographed the unidentified lights with my digital camera which was equipped with a telephoto lens and mounted on a tripod. i also made a few time exposures with my camera. at first i thought the light might have been a flare but it remained stationary and then a red light appeared to move from it. the night sky at the time of the sighting was completely black until the lights appeared. i talked with a few of the locals and asked about what the origin of the lights might be. they had no idea. i have been a professional photographer for over 35 years and this has to be one of the strangest sights that i have ever witnessed and/or photographed.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright light appeared suddenly in night sky and ascended and descended 3 or four times. a smaller red light was also seen moving around the white light.

content.detailedDescription:
My daughter called me around 1:20 a.M. to inform me that she was in the er with a kidney stone. she requested that i come to the hospital to take her home as she had finally passed a stone but had been given pain medication and was advised not to drive.
i picked her up from the hospital and took her home. she assured me that she would be fine and just wanted to sleep as she needed to go to work the next morning. 
i drove the 6-7 miles home and pulled into my driveway and got out of my car. it was 3 a.M. and i looked up at all the stars in the sky, noting their beauty when suddenly above me i heard a swish. directly above me about  50-100 ft. off the ground, i looked up to see something that was both beautiful and terrifying at the same time. there was a large stingray shaped entity slowly pulsating as it flew above me. it was as large as my house which is 2500 square feet. i noted that i could see the stars through its body, although its outline was clearly visible. it did not fly as birds fly but rather seemed to undulate its body along in a perfect synchronized manner. 
my house sits about 150 ft. from my neighbors and its shape covered the space between out houses so it was quite wide. as it undulated, i could see that hanging down from its back was something that looked like a tail or legs held together. i could not be sure as it continued to move as i watched it transfixed. it made no other sound except that initial swish when i looked up. i think it wanted me to see it, i felt that; as i watched it until it disappeared across a farm field in the back of my neighbors home. there was no odor of light associated with my sighting except the stars. at no time did i feel that it intended to harm me but even after it disappeared from sight, i felt frozen in amazement. i could not sleep after i went to bed and even now i gaze at the sky looking for it.  

has anyone else reported this entity?
content.summary: Stingray shaped entity that was large and silent

content.detailedDescription: Just seen a ufo, light blinked brightly in sky, thought was meteor, then it came back and curved in a u shape then slowly went out. ne was the direction about two hands up.
content.summary: Just seen a ufo, light blinked brightly in sky, thought was meteor, then it came back and curved in a u shape then slowly went out. ne was the direction about two hands up.
